CHAT.comment: Teaching. Mother and Child sit on the living room floor. Mother first teaches Child to string beads on a shoelace. Then , she teaches her to sort black and white buttons into two small boxes. The TV is on making it difficult to understand what Child is saying. Otherwise , Child's speech is fairly comprehensible.

u.a: takes string and demonstrates as she talks .
goes to turn bead in Child's hand .
ignores Mother , picks up another bead .
holds bead next to those on string .
guides C's hands in stringing bead .
holds string and bead to Mother .
guides Child's hand to correct box .
puts black button in Child's hand .
puts white button in Child's hand .
guides Child's hand to white box .
